direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are fundamental for object comparison and state representation, often used together in hash-based collections.
Both methods are used for comparing objects, though compareTo is typically for ordering.
Both methods involve deep inspection and copying of the object's state, though clone is more focused on creating a duplicate.
Both methods handle invalid inputs and may throw exceptions, though validate is more specific to string validation.
Both methods process input values, though processValue is more focused on handling option values.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
